page.title: 08Health-Our Old Folk.
page.content: Mr.Bradford lives in Godstone's Old People's Homes. He used to play ball games but now he is incapable of this. The warden looks after him and treats him well. The Home has been there for 10 years and Mrs.Cambert,Mrs.Redford and Mrs.Smith have worked there since it opened. Mr.Walter Coleman,98 years old,is the oldest resident. In Blechingley,the hospital was used for old folk but in 1985, it was demolished to make room for housing. The old people were moved to homes near Redhill and Reigate.
